alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 10 at 1:12AM MST until January 10 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...West winds at 40 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected for higher terrain, gusts up to 65 mph are possible for lower terrain. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains and Huerfano County * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Cross winds on Interstate 25 are expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy blowing dust may reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
